epd_metadata.epd_owner_address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.epd_produced_by_address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
epd_metadata.epd_process_certified_by_address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.product_use: Construction material for foundations, driveways, footpaths, major infrastructure, high-rise buildings, dams, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure, marine applications, architectural finishes, and other decorative applications

product_classification.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths
product_classification.special_class: High-strength/high-performance concrete, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications

product_description.dangerous_goods_classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail
product_description.hazardous_substances: None listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified (scope is cradle to delivery)

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.temporal_representativeness: Data updated within 10 years as required

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity
system_boundaries.core_processes: External transportation of materials; manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing in truck); treatment of waste and wastewater
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Distribution of concrete mixes; installation; wastage; transport and treatment of waste at end of life
system_boundaries.other_environmental_information: Module D includes environmental benefits from reuse, recovery, and recycling of deconstructed concrete

installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities: Pouring concrete from truck and pump; manual finishing; excludes pre-installation site work and forms

end_of_life.control: No control by Holcim over end-of-life fate

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

end_of_life.module_d_benefits: Environmental benefits from reuse, recovery, and recycling of deconstructed concrete; recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete during use stage onward
carbonation.note: Not considered in this EPD and not reflected in results

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes
recycled_materials_handling.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

references: Australian Life Cycle Inventory Database Initiative (2023)
British Standards Institution BS EN 15804:2012+A2:2019 and BS EN 16757:2017
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
EPD International General Programme Instructions and PCR documents (2024)
Man Yu et al., The Carbon Footprint of Australia's Construction Sector, Procedia Engineering, 2017
disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks
Certain impact categories have high uncertainties or limited experience
Ionising radiation indicator excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects

contact_information.address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
